tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE ad_campaign_metrics (
    campaign_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    impressions INT,
    clicks INT,
    conversions INT,
    cost DECIMAL,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE ad_campaigns (
  campaign_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  campaign_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  start_date DATE,
  end_date DATE,
  budget DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE ad_metrics (
  metric_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  campaign_id INT,
  date DATE,
  impressions INT,
  clicks INT,
  conversions INT
);

CREATE TABLE ad_performance (
  performance_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  campaign_id INT,
  date DATE,
  spend DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL,
  revenue DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE ad_campaigns (
    id INT,
    campaign_name TEXT,
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE,
    budget DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE ad_clicks (
    id INT,
    ad_id INT,
    click_time TIMESTAMP,
    user_id INT,
    platform TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE ad_impressions (
    id INT,
    ad_id INT,
    impression_time TIMESTAMP,
    user_id INT,
    platform TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE ad_performance (
    id INT,
    ad_id INT,
    clicks INT,
    impressions INT,
    ctr DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE ad_campaigns (
  campaign_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  campaign_name TEXT,
  start_date TIMESTAMP,
  end_date TIMESTAMP,
  budget DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE ad_metrics (
  metric_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  campaign_id UUID,
  date DATE,
  impressions INT,
  clicks INT,
  conversions INT
);
